Title: Once Upon a Time in America
Writer: Harry Grey (based on novel "The Hoods" by), Leonardo Benvenuti (screenplay by), Piero De Bernardi (screenplay by), Enrico Medioli (screenplay by), Franco Arcalli (screenplay by), Franco Ferrini (screenplay by), Sergio Leone (screenplay by), Stuart Kaminsky (additional dialogue)
Actors: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Treat Williams
Plot: Epic tale of a group of Jewish gangsters in New York, from childhood, through their glory years during prohibition, and their meeting again 35 years later.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 11 wins & 9 nominations.
